sentence.Network_cn: 忍耐是爱受试炼时的坚持.

sentence.Network_en: The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace , longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith , meekness, temperance.
sentence.Network_cn: 圣灵所结的果子,就是仁爱, 喜乐, 和平,忍耐, 恩慈, 良善, 信实, 温柔, 节制.

sentence.Network_en: Preach Bein season and out of season. Convince , rebuke , exhort, with all longsuffering and teaching.
sentence.Network_cn: 2务要传道,无论得时不得时,总要专心; 并用百般的忍耐,各样的教训, 责备人 、 警戒人、劝勉人.

entry.tran: 长期忍受的；饱受磨难的
entry.def: Someone who is long-suffering patiently puts up with a lot of trouble or unhappiness, especially when it is caused by someone else.

example.ex: He went back to Yorkshire to join his loyal, long-suffering wife.
example.tran: 他回到约克郡，与对他忠贞不贰、饱受磨难的妻子团聚。
